resources.string: This feature is not supported by JW Player.
Note: WebVTT subtitles are not working at all.
Note: There is option to go back 10 sec provided by JW Player only. There is no built-in +10 button control to go forward.
Note: According documentation JW Player has DRM support, but we could not test it because we did not have appropriate video file URL for test.
Note: According documentation JW Player supports Freewheel ads, but we could not test it because we did not have appropriate ads URL for test.
Note: For bitrate, there is option to read value, but not to set new one.
Note: According documentation JW Player supports various types of ads (VAST, IMA, Freewheel), but for some reason they do not work.
